subject: Reginald here
body:
May I have a few minutes of your time?

Great. Thank You

Listen if you have a phone and can return calls each day then I wish to hear from you.

By simply returning telephone calls each day there is the potential for you to bring in Fifteen Hundred to Three Thousand daily or weekly.

Yes its true. I do it everyday and there is room for a few more people to join in on this exciting business.

So go to your phone, the call costs you nothing and listen to what I want to reveal to you.

800-570-1895


I hope you don't pass this up, but if you choose to and wish not to hear from me anymore simply email me back with your request.


Regards
___________________________





I entered the hospital room that was mourning the death of my dreams. Mia looked at me and tears sneaked through her eyes. In a torn voice, she started apologizing to me.
